title: Happy Birthday, Nico-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Nico-senpaaai.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>My, if it isn’t Kasumi. Did you bring me a birthday present, by any chance?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>....Today is that day that Kasumin will say everything that Kasumin has been meaning to tell you, Nico-senpai!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Haah? What is it, all of a sudden?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>You a~lways say you’re the number one idol, Nico-senpai, but the number one is Kasumin, okay! And you also say that you’re like the cute type school idol, but that’s Kasumin’s exclusive trademark. Kasumin is cuter anyway!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Haaah!!?? I thought I’d give you a listen, but what the hell are you on about!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>....But well, your persistence in becoming a cute idol to every extent is somewhat amazing, Nico-senpai.... and there are things that Kasumin can learn from you.... and there are parts of you that Kasumin respects as well....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>So uhh, umm.... Happy birthday!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>....Pfft, Ahahaha! You really aren’t an honest one, are you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Well, thank you. As the number one school idol in the universe, Nico always aims for greater heights, so you better come after me, okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
